gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 101, Grizzlies 95
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers defeated the Grizzlies, 101-95. Kawhi Leonard recorded 24 points, eight rebounds, and four assists for the Clippers, while Terance Mann added a season-high 23 points and 12 rebounds in the victory. Jaren Jackson Jr. tallied 29 points, five assists, and four rebounds for the Grizzlies in the losing effort. The Clippers improve to 37-18, while the Grizzlies fall to 20-37.
